predicate.note: Frames file for 'autograph' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

example.name: passive
example.text: `` I feel like a little kid , '' says [*T*-1] a gleeful Alex de Castro , a car salesman , who [*T*-53] has stopped by a workout of the Suns [*-3] to slip six Campaneris cards [*ICH*-2] to the Great Man Himself [0] [*T*-4] to be autographed [*-30] .
